thread.title: BRIEF-Indra with Alstom Espana to install security systems in tunnels on Antequera-Granada section
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Indra with Alstom Espana to install security systems in tunnels on Antequera-Granada section | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Indra with Alstom Espana to install security systems in tunnels on Antequera-Granada section
text:
Oct 21 Indra Sistemas SA :
* A consortium formed by Indra (50 percent) and Alstom Espana (50 percent) has won the contract to install public safety and security systems in the six tunnels on the high-speed rail link connecting Antequera and Granada
* The contract also includes system maintenance for a period of 42 months
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
